/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊕ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊕ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
theorem schur_complement_eq₂₂ [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] (A : Matrix m m 𝕜) (B : Matrix m n 𝕜)
    {D : Matrix n n 𝕜} (x : m → 𝕜) (y : n → 𝕜) [Invertible D] (hD : D.is_hermitian) :
    matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star («expr ⊕ᵥ » x y)) (fromBlocks A B (matrix.conj_transpose B) D)) («expr ⊕ᵥ » x y) =
      matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star ((matrix.mul D⁻¹ (matrix.conj_transpose B)).mul_vec x + y)) D)
          ((matrix.mul D⁻¹ (matrix.conj_transpose B)).mul_vec x + y) +
        matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star x) (A - matrix.mul (matrix.mul B D⁻¹) (matrix.conj_transpose B))) x :=
  by
  simp [Function.star_sum_elim, from_blocks_mul_vec, vec_mul_from_blocks, add_vec_mul, dot_product_mul_vec, vec_mul_sub,
    Matrix.mul_assoc, vec_mul_mul_vec, hD.eq, conj_transpose_nonsing_inv, star_mul_vec]
  abel
#align schur_complement_eq₂₂ schur_complement_eq₂₂
schur_complement_eq₁₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊕ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊕ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
theorem schur_complement_eq₁₁ [Fintype m] [DecidableEq m] [Fintype n] {A : Matrix m m 𝕜} (B : Matrix m n 𝕜)
    (D : Matrix n n 𝕜) (x : m → 𝕜) (y : n → 𝕜) [Invertible A] (hA : A.is_hermitian) :
    matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star («expr ⊕ᵥ » x y)) (fromBlocks A B (matrix.conj_transpose B) D)) («expr ⊕ᵥ » x y) =
      matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star (x + (matrix.mul A⁻¹ B).mul_vec y)) A) (x + (matrix.mul A⁻¹ B).mul_vec y) +
        matrix.dot_product (vecMul (star y) (D - matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.conj_transpose B) A⁻¹) B)) y :=
  by
  simp [Function.star_sum_elim, from_blocks_mul_vec, vec_mul_from_blocks, add_vec_mul, dot_product_mul_vec, vec_mul_sub,
    Matrix.mul_assoc, vec_mul_mul_vec, hA.eq, conj_transpose_nonsing_inv, star_mul_vec]
  abel
#align schur_complement_eq₁₁ schur_complement_eq₁₁
from_blocks₂₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
theorem pos_semidef.from_blocks₂₂ [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] (A : Matrix m m 𝕜) (B : Matrix m n 𝕜)
    {D : Matrix n n 𝕜} (hD : D.pos_def) [Invertible D] :
    (fromBlocks A B (matrix.conj_transpose B) D).pos_semidef ↔
      (A - matrix.mul (matrix.mul B D⁻¹) (matrix.conj_transpose B)).pos_semidef :=
  by
  rw [← pos_semidef_submatrix_equiv (Equiv.sumComm n m), Equiv.sumComm_apply, from_blocks_submatrix_sum_swap_sum_swap]
  convert pos_semidef.from_blocks₁₁ _ _ hD <;> first |infer_instance|simp
#align pos_semidef.from_blocks₂₂ pos_semidef.from_blocks₂₂
from_blocks₁₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊕ᵥ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.conj_transpose -/
theorem pos_semidef.from_blocks₁₁ [Fintype m] [DecidableEq m] [Fintype n] {A : Matrix m m 𝕜} (B : Matrix m n 𝕜)
    (D : Matrix n n 𝕜) (hA : A.pos_def) [Invertible A] :
    (fromBlocks A B (matrix.conj_transpose B) D).pos_semidef ↔
      (D - matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.conj_transpose B) A⁻¹) B).pos_semidef :=
  by
  rw [pos_semidef, is_hermitian.from_blocks₁₁ _ _ hA.1]
  constructor
  · refine' fun h => ⟨h.1, fun x => _⟩
    have := h.2 («expr ⊕ᵥ » (-(matrix.mul A⁻¹ B).mul_vec x) x)
    rw [dot_product_mul_vec, schur_complement_eq₁₁ B D _ _ hA.1, neg_add_self, dot_product_zero, zero_add] at this
    rw [dot_product_mul_vec]
    exact this
  · refine' fun h => ⟨h.1, fun x => _⟩
    rw [dot_product_mul_vec, ← Sum.elim_comp_inl_inr x, schur_complement_eq₁₁ B D _ _ hA.1, map_add]
    apply le_add_of_nonneg_of_le
    · rw [← dot_product_mul_vec]
      apply hA.pos_semidef.2
    · rw [← dot_product_mul_vec]
      apply h.2
#align pos_semidef.from_blocks₁₁ pos_semidef.from_blocks₁₁
from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₂₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/-- LDU decomposition of a block matrix with an invertible bottom-right corner, using the
Schur complement. -/
theorem from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₂₂ (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix l n α) (C : Matrix n m α) (D : Matrix n n α)
    [Invertible D] :
    fromBlocks A B C D =
      matrix.mul
        (matrix.mul (fromBlocks 1 (matrix.mul B ((«expr⅟») D)) 0 1)
          (fromBlocks (A - matrix.mul (matrix.mul B ((«expr⅟») D)) C) 0 0 D))
        (fromBlocks 1 0 (matrix.mul ((«expr⅟») D) C) 1) :=
  (Matrix.reindex (Equiv.sumComm _ _) (Equiv.sumComm _ _)).injective <| by
    simpa [reindex_apply, Equiv.sumComm_symm, ← submatrix_mul_equiv _ _ _ (Equiv.sumComm n m), ←
      submatrix_mul_equiv _ _ _ (Equiv.sumComm n l), Equiv.sumComm_apply, from_blocks_submatrix_sum_swap_sum_swap] using
      from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁ D C B A
#align from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₂₂ from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₂₂
from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Alexander Bentkamp, Eric Wieser, Jeremy Avigad, Johan Commelin

/-- LDU decomposition of a block matrix with an invertible top-left corner, using the
Schur complement. -/
theorem from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁ (A : Matrix m m α) (B : Matrix m n α) (C : Matrix l m α) (D : Matrix l n α)
    [Invertible A] :
    fromBlocks A B C D =
      matrix.mul
        (matrix.mul (fromBlocks 1 0 (matrix.mul C ((«expr⅟») A)) 1)
          (fromBlocks A 0 0 (D - matrix.mul (matrix.mul C ((«expr⅟») A)) B)))
        (fromBlocks 1 (matrix.mul ((«expr⅟») A) B) 0 1) :=
  by
  simp only [from_blocks_multiply, Matrix.mul_zero, Matrix.zero_mul, add_zero, zero_add, Matrix.one_mul, Matrix.mul_one,
    Matrix.invOf_mul_self, Matrix.mul_invOf_self_assoc, Matrix.mul_invOf_mul_self_cancel, Matrix.mul_assoc,
    add_sub_cancel'_right]
#align from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁ from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁
det_one_sub_mul_comm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem det_one_sub_mul_comm (A : Matrix m n α) (B : Matrix n m α) :
    det (1 - matrix.mul A B) = det (1 - matrix.mul B A) := by
  rw [sub_eq_add_neg, ← Matrix.neg_mul, det_one_add_mul_comm, Matrix.mul_neg, ← sub_eq_add_neg]
#align det_one_sub_mul_comm det_one_sub_mul_comm
det_one_add_mul_comm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/-- The **Weinstein–Aronszajn identity**. Note the `1` on the LHS is of shape m×m, while the `1` on
the RHS is of shape n×n. -/
theorem det_one_add_mul_comm (A : Matrix m n α) (B : Matrix n m α) :
    det (1 + matrix.mul A B) = det (1 + matrix.mul B A) :=
  calc
    det (1 + matrix.mul A B) = det (fromBlocks 1 (-A) B 1) := by
      rw [det_from_blocks_one₂₂, Matrix.neg_mul, sub_neg_eq_add]
    _ = det (1 + matrix.mul B A) := by rw [det_from_blocks_one₁₁, Matrix.mul_neg, sub_neg_eq_add]
    
#align det_one_add_mul_comm det_one_add_mul_comm
det_one_add_col_mul_row:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/-- A special case of the **Matrix determinant lemma** for when `A = I`.

TODO: show this more generally. -/
theorem det_one_add_col_mul_row (u v : m → α) : det (1 + matrix.mul (col u) (row v)) = 1 + matrix.dot_product v u := by
  rw [det_one_add_mul_comm, det_unique, Pi.add_apply, Pi.add_apply, Matrix.one_apply_eq, Matrix.row_mul_col_apply]
#align det_one_add_col_mul_row det_one_add_col_mul_row
det_mul_add_one_comm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/-- Alternate statement of the **Weinstein–Aronszajn identity** -/
theorem det_mul_add_one_comm (A : Matrix m n α) (B : Matrix n m α) :
    det (matrix.mul A B + 1) = det (matrix.mul B A + 1) := by rw [add_comm, det_one_add_mul_comm, add_comm]
#align det_mul_add_one_comm det_mul_add_one_comm
det_from_blocks₂₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/-- Determinant of a 2×2 block matrix, expanded around an invertible bottom right element in terms
of the Schur complement. -/
theorem det_from_blocks₂₂ (A : Matrix m m α) (B : Matrix m n α) (C : Matrix n m α) (D : Matrix n n α) [Invertible D] :
    (Matrix.fromBlocks A B C D).det = det D * det (A - matrix.mul (matrix.mul B ((«expr⅟») D)) C) :=
  by
  have : from_blocks A B C D = (from_blocks D C B A).submatrix (Equiv.sumComm _ _) (Equiv.sumComm _ _) :=
    by
    ext (i j)
    cases i <;> cases j <;> rfl
  rw [this, det_submatrix_equiv_self, det_from_blocks₁₁]
#align det_from_blocks₂₂ det_from_blocks₂₂
det_from_blocks₁₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⅟» -/
/-- Determinant of a 2×2 block matrix, expanded around an invertible top left element in terms of
the Schur complement. -/
theorem det_from_blocks₁₁ (A : Matrix m m α) (B : Matrix m n α) (C : Matrix n m α) (D : Matrix n n α) [Invertible A] :
    (Matrix.fromBlocks A B C D).det = det A * det (D - matrix.mul (matrix.mul C ((«expr⅟») A)) B) := by
  rw [from_blocks_eq_of_invertible₁₁, det_mul, det_mul, det_from_blocks_zero₂₁, det_from_blocks_zero₂₁,
    det_from_blocks_zero₁₂, det_one, det_one, one_mul, one_mul, mul_one]
#align det_from_blocks₁₁ det_from_blocks₁₁
det_from_blocks_one₂₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
@[simp]
theorem det_from_blocks_one₂₂ (A : Matrix m m α) (B : Matrix m n α) (C : Matrix n m α) :
    (Matrix.fromBlocks A B C 1).det = det (A - matrix.mul B C) :=
  by
  haveI : Invertible (1 : Matrix n n α) := invertibleOne
  rw [det_from_blocks₂₂, invOf_one, Matrix.mul_one, det_one, one_mul]
#align det_from_blocks_one₂₂ det_from_blocks_one₂₂
det_from_blocks_one₁₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
@[simp]
theorem det_from_blocks_one₁₁ (B : Matrix m n α) (C : Matrix n m α) (D : Matrix n n α) :
    (Matrix.fromBlocks 1 B C D).det = det (D - matrix.mul C B) :=
  by
  haveI : Invertible (1 : Matrix m m α) := invertibleOne
  rw [det_from_blocks₁₁, invOf_one, Matrix.mul_one, det_one, one_mul]
#align det_from_blocks_one₁₁ det_from_blocks_one₁₁
